name: Format\Map
description: The component for adding a map.

properties.name: accessibilityCaption
properties.description: Optional caption text describing what is visible on the map. Note that this property differs from caption: although the caption may be displayed to users, the accessibilityCaption is used for voice-over only. The value in this property should describe the contents of the map for non-sighted users. If this property is omitted, the value from caption is used for voice-over.

properties.name: caption
properties.description: A string that describes what is displayed on the map. The caption will be displayed in the full screen version of the map, and could be used for voice-over.

properties.name: items
properties.description: Array of MapItems. If latitude and longitude are not set, at least one item containing latitude and longitude should be added to the items array.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: The latitude of the map’s center. Provide both a latitude and longitude, or an array of items.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: The longitude of the map’s center. Provide both a latitude and longitude, or an array of items.

properties.name: mapType
properties.description: Use this to define the type of map to display by default. Valid values are:

properties.name: role
properties.description: This component always has a role of map.

properties.name: span
properties.description: Optional configuration for defining the visible area of a map, relative to its center. A span is defined in deltas for latitude and longitude.
